remarks: If in a context ` x ` is not free in ` ps ` and ` ch ` , it is not free in ` ( ps <-> ch ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 29-Dec-2017.)
statement:
nfbid.1 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ps ) $.
nfbid.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ch ) $.
nfbid $p |- ( ph -> F/ x ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
